prompt_base: cinematic photograph of a beautiful young alien woman, pale mint green skin tone, short spiky white hair, large amethyst purple eyes, futuristic galactic patrol suit
feature_prompt: hyperdetailed skin texture, subsurface scattering, high gloss texture on suit, realistic hair texture
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, neon green skin, dark green, flat lighting, low quality, helmet effect, deformed eyes
